timeline.bodyText: This is wrapped in Angular, so I can either 1) condition what content is shown within the file on the feature flag, or 2) branch what route we go to based on the feature flag in a few different places. I started out working on 1), but it would be relatively easy to switch to 2) if you, esteemed reviewer, think it would be cleaner.
